summary:
As an experienced educator with over last six years of teaching in diverse environments, I have honed my skills in providing engaging and effective instruction across various subjects, including language, math, science, and social studies. I have developed a deep understanding of different teaching techniques and educational technologies, which I utilize to create a dynamic and interactive learning experience for my students.

Over the years, I have cultivated a supportive and inclusive classroom environment that motivates students to participate, collaborate, and enhance their critical thinking abilities. By employing formative and summative assessment strategies, I am able to closely monitor students' progress and adjust lesson plans to cater to their varied learning requirements.

Collaborating closely with parents and guardians has been an integral part of my teaching philosophy. I have worked hard to create strong relationships, establish effective communication channels, and handle concerns regarding student conduct, academic progress, and welfare. By doing so, I have been able to foster a positive and collaborative relationship with parents and guardians, which has contributed to the overall success of my students.

I have also contributed to the formulation and execution of school-wide policies and projects, including curriculum design, extracurricular programs, and teacher professional development. Through my involvement in these initiatives, I have been able to make a positive impact on the school community, as well as advance my own professional development as an educator.

school.name: State Council of Educational Research & Training

education.field_of_study: Teacher Education and Professional Development, Specific Subject Areas

school.name: Sant Gadge Baba Amravati University, Amravati

profile_positions.description:
Provided captivating and effective instruction for various subjects, such as language, math, science, and social studies, by utilizing diverse teaching techniques and educational technologies.
Cultivated a supportive and comprehensive classroom atmosphere that motivated pupils to participate, cooperate, and enhance their critical thinking abilities.
Utilized formative and summative assessment strategies to supervise students' advancement and adjust lesson plans to cater to their varied learning requirements.
Collaborated closely with parents and guardians to create a strong relationship, establish effective communication channels, and handle concerns regarding student conduct, academic progress, and welfare.
Contributed to the formulation and execution of school-wide policies and projects, including curriculum design, extracurricular programs, and teacher professional development.
profile_positions.title: Primary School Teacher

profile_positions.description:
Helped young learners develop cognitive and social skills using a well-planned curriculum and enjoyable, interactive activities.
Employed a variety of teaching approaches, such as storytelling, music, and play-based learning, to generate a favorable and inspiring learning setting for kids.
Maintained regular and transparent communication with parents regarding their child's progress, provided feedback, and conferred on methods for continuous development.
Devised and executed age-appropriate lesson plans, classroom management methods, and assessment techniques to track advancement and guarantee the attainment of educational goals.
Cultivated a secure, empathetic, and all-encompassing classroom ambiance that stimulates originality, rational thinking, and appreciation for diversity amongst pupils.
profile_positions.title: Pre-Primary Teacher
